titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Arbovirus Research Unit, Department of Epidemiology and Public Health, Yale University, Records
Arbovirus Research Unit of the Department of Epidemiology and Public Health, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:41

did.unittitle: Arbovirus Research Unit, Department of Epidemiology and Public Health, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative and research files documenting the activities and operations of the Arbovirus Research Unit of the Department of Epidemiology and Public Health, Yale School of Medicine.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-I (YRG 27-I), Records of Yale School of Epidemiology and Public Health.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Arbovirus Research Unit, Department of Epidemiology and Public Health, Yale University, Records (RU 410). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by type of material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative and research files documenting the activities and operations of the Arbovirus Research Unit of the Department of Epidemiology and Public Health, Yale School of Medicine.
